The news was spread by a Kannada channel: which was the original source of the claim.
The claim was widely shared on social me: particularly by BJP supporters who saw it as an opportunity to target both Mamata Banerjee and Kumaraswamy.
Right: wing website Swarajya also shared the news without verifying its authenticity, but later updated their report to state that the Karnataka DGP had refuted the news.
The News Minute: a reliable news source, confirmed that no transfer order had been issued and quoted Kumaraswamy denying the claim.
